src_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha i-SAIC yesine ngoLwesine, mhla zingama-24 kuNdasa 2022 e-Sandton Convention Centre eGol Ingqungquthela iyingxenye yomkhankaso wotshalomali kahulumeni ukuheha imali eyi-Rtrillion eminyakeni emihlanu, futhi iheha izihambeli eziphuma eNingizimu Afrika nasemhlabeni jikelele ukuzoxoxisana ngamathuba otshalomal
trg_text: South Africa Investment Conference (SAIC) South Africa will host its fourth SAIC on Thursday, 24 March 2022 at the Sandton Convention Centre in Johannesbur The conference is part of government s investment drive to attract Rtrillion over five years, and it attracts delegates from South Africa and worldwide to discuss investment opportunitie Since the first investment conference in 2018, South Africa has attracted R774 billion in commitments across a wide range of economic sector Of the 152 investment announcements made previously, 45 projects have already been complete A further 57 projects are currently under constructio

src_text: Kusukela ngengqungquthela yokuqala yotshalomali ngowezi-2018, iNingizimu Afrika isithole izethembiso zotshalomali eziyizigidigidi ezingama-R774 kulolonke uchungechunge lwemikhakha yezomnoth Lolu tshalomali olusha luzosisiza ukuthi sikhulise umnotho, sisungule imisebenzi edingekayo futhi sithuthukise izimpilo zabantu
